name: TONIGHT WE HUNT
description:
PROJECT IN DEVELOPMENT

A hunter seeks revenge against the demons he faced in his past.

CONTROLS:

A and D To Move

J to Jump

K to Attack

L to Heal

S+J Roll

Hello everyone, we have been working on Tonight we hunt final game, the project still on development but meanwhile we can show you this demo, we hope you like it.

If you are interested in Tonight we hunt game you can follow the instagram or facebook page of Tonight we hunt.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tonight_we_hunt_game

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TonightWeHuntGame

If you want make some donations I will be very grateful :)
